Sentencas: In this study, a planar solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) apparatus with a 6 cm x 6 cm anode supported single cell based on a modified button cell was designed for operation in both regular cell and button cell configurations.
Titulo: Improvement on the design and fabrication of planar SOFCs with anode-supported cells based on modified button cells

Sentencas: The apparatus was assembled with a regular cell with an active area of 5 cm x 5 cm and with a button cell with an active area of 2.54 cm(2).
Titulo: Improvement on the design and fabrication of planar SOFCs with anode-supported cells based on modified button cells

Sentencas: They consist of fuel and oxidant chambers that allow heat conversion and thus increase the temperatures of the fuel inlet and oxidant inlet streams.
Titulo: Improvement on the design and fabrication of planar SOFCs with anode-supported cells based on modified button cells

Sentencas: The chambers reduced the cooling effect, thereby improved the cell performance.
Titulo: Improvement on the design and fabrication of planar SOFCs with anode-supported cells based on modified button cells

Sentencas: In addition, a wire-in-tube-type heat exchanger was designed and fabricated.
Titulo: Improvement on the design and fabrication of planar SOFCs with anode-supported cells based on modified button cells

Sentencas: This device was installed in front of the fuel inlet of the SOFC apparatus to improve heat transfer to better increase the temperature of the fuel inlet stream.
Titulo: Improvement on the design and fabrication of planar SOFCs with anode-supported cells based on modified button cells

Sentencas: Results indicate that the fuel outlet temperature of the system with heat exchanger is much higher than that of the system without heat exchanger.
Titulo: Improvement on the design and fabrication of planar SOFCs with anode-supported cells based on modified button cells

Sentencas: Thus, the performance of system with heat exchanger is largely improved.
Titulo: Improvement on the design and fabrication of planar SOFCs with anode-supported cells based on modified button cells

Sentencas: This improvement means that the wire-in-tube-type heat exchanger is proved to be effectively increases the hydrogen inlet temperature by enhancing heat transfer.
Titulo: Improvement on the design and fabrication of planar SOFCs with anode-supported cells based on modified button cells
Improvement on the design and fabrication of planar SOFCs with anode-supported cells based on modified button cells
Improvement on the design and fabrication of planar SOFCs with anode-supported cells based on modified button cells
